TITLE Spanish-Style Brined Pork Tenderloin

{[Brined Pork]
# Trim [1.5 lbs pork tenderloin].
# In a container combine [3 cup water], [1/4 cup kosher salt], [1/4 cup sugar], [1/4 cup sherry vinegar]. Stir to disolve.
# Brine for 1-3 hours. 
}
 
{[Spice Rub]
# In a small bowl combine: [2 tbl paprika], [2 tsp sugar], [1 tsp black pepper], [1 tsp [chopped] sage], [1 tsp [chopped] thyme], [2 cloves garlic[, minced]]. 
}

# Prepare grill.
# Remove pork from bag, and discard brine. Pat pork dry with paper towels. 
# Brush [2 tsp olive oil] evenly over pork; rub with $[Spice Rub].
# Grill. Let rest.
# Slice and sprinkle with [2 tsp sherry vinegar].
